children.value: QIIME 2 plugin for functional annotation and taxonomic classification of shotgun metagenomes.
is available as part of the QIIME 2 moshpit distribution. For installation and usage instructions please consult the official
This QIIME 2 plugin contains actions used to annotate and classify (meta)genomes:
Bin contigs into MAGs using MetaBat 2.
Create a DIAMOND reference database from a FASTA input file.
Create a DIAMOND reference database for the specified taxon.
Fetch an existing or build a custom Kraken 2 database.
Construct the human pangenome Bowtie 2 index.
Perform read abundance re-estimation using Bracken.
Evaluate quality of the generated MAGs using BUSCO.
Extract annotation frequencies from all annotations.
Fetch the complete Diamond database necessary to run the eggnog-diamond-search action.
Fetch the databases necessary to run the eggnog-annotate action.
Fetch the taxon specific database necessary to run the eggnog-hmmer-search action.
Fetch the databases necessary to run the build-eggnog-diamond-db action.
Filter Kraken 2 reports and outputs by metadata and/or abundance
Select downstream MAG features from Kraken 2.
Predict gene sequences from MAGs using Prodigal.
Run eggNOG search using Diamond aligner.
Run eggNOG search using HMMER aligner.
ENH: add read/MAG classification using Kraken2 by
ENH: add an action to build a Kraken 2 database by
ENH: add read/MAG classification using Kraken2 by
ENH: add an action to build a Kraken 2 database by
ENH: enable contig binning using MetaBAT 2 by
ENH: add CheckM bin evaluation action by
FIX: correctly install pplacer during conda build by
ci: clean up coverage tasks by
MAINT: move CheckM action to a brand new plugin (q2-checkm) by

name: q2-annotate
description: QIIME 2 plugin for functional annotation and taxonomic classification of shotgun metagenomes.
